resources.string: Please set on ACCESS SETTING PERMISSION for the app
GPS data is the user position in terms of latitude and logitude.
User\'s contacts informations stored in the smartphone (with phone numbers).
Accounts data are user\'s accounts informations (application package and user name) stored in the smartphone.
Information about the applications installed on the device.
Network traffic statistics in terms of bytes transmitted and received over mobile net and Wifi. These statistics may not be available on all platforms.
Activity done by the user (es. walking, run or go in vehicle)
There are data not yet saved! \n Do you want to do it now or wait for the phone to charge?
Hi! \nWelcome to Myrror an app for user modeling.
The app will collect some of your data, then you can go to the Myrror website and see them
For this reason we ask you to accept the permits that will be requested. \n n particular, the permits concern telephone contacts and access to the location.
For this reason we ask you to accept the permits that will be requested. \n In particular, the permits concern telephone contacts and access to the location and activities
The app detects the location, please set this permission to always allow
The app extracts your contacts, please accept this permission
The app detects the amount of network that is used (Kb and Mb) so it is necessary to accept the call management permission
The app tracks your activities, please accept this permission
Later it will be possible to decide whether or not to share this data and how often to do it
La mail o la password sono errati
